name: backup
description: Starts a server backup. Authed only.

name: ban
description: Bans the specified player with an optional reason from the server. /ban <name> [reason ...]. Authed only.

name: ban-ip
description: Bans the specified IP address with an optional reason from the server. /ban <address|name> [reason ...]. Authed only.

name: banlist
description: List IP addresses and names on the server. /banlist [ips|players]. Authed only.

name: ctps
description: Broadcasts the current CoFH TPS to the channel.

name: defaultgamemode
description: Change the server's default game mode. /defaultgamemode <mode>. Authed only.

name: deop
description: De-Op a player. /deop <player>. Authed only.

name: difficulty
description: Change the server's difficulty level. /difficulty <new difficulty>. Authed only.

name: disarm
description: Drop all items from the specified player's inventory. /disarm <player>. Authed only.

name: gamemode
description: Change the server's or a player's current game mode. /gamemode <mode> [player]. Authed only.

name: gamerule
description: Change the server's game rules. /gamerule <rule name> <value> OR /gamerule <rule name>. Authed only.

name: give
description: Give a player item(s). /give <player> <item> [amount] [data] [dataTag]. Authed only.

name: heal
description: Heals the given player to full health. /heal <player>. Authed only.

name: help
description: Changes EiraIRCs help command to broadcast into the channel instead.

name: kick
description: Kicks the specified player with an optional reason from the server. /kick <player> [reason ...]. Authed only.

name: killall
description: Kills all entities of the given type. /killall [entity]. Authed only.

name: killplayer
description: Kills the specified player. /killplayer [username]. Authed only.

name: mem
description: Broadcasts the current server memory usage to the channel.

name: motd
description: Broadcasts the current server message of the day to the channel.

name: morph.demorph
description: Makes a player demorph. /morph demorph [player] [force demorph even if offline (true/false)]. Authed only.

name: morph.clear
description: Clears a player's morphs. /morph clear [player]. Authed only.

name: morph.whitelist
description: Adds a player to the morph skill whitelist, turning it on. /morph whitelist <player>. Authed only.

name: morph.unwhitelist
description: Removes a player to the morph skill whitelist, turning it off. /morph unwhitelist <player>. Authed only.

name: op
description: Op a player. /op <player>. Authed only.

name: pardon
description: Unbans (pardons) the specified player on the server. /pardon <name>. Authed only.

name: pardon-ip
description: Unbans (pardons) the specified IP address on the server. /pardon-ip <address>. Authed only.

name: players
description: An alias for the who command called players.

name: silence
description: Adds/removes silence on a player or reload the silence list. /silence <add|remove|reload> <player>. Authed only.

name: soulnetwork
description: Modify player's Blood Magic Soul Network (Life Essence). /soulnetwork <player> <add|subtract|fill|empty|get> [amount]. Authed only.

name: thaumcraft
description: Modify player's Thaumcraft values. /thaumcraft <action> [<player> [<params>]]. Authed only.

name: time
description: Set the global time of the world. /time <set|add> <value>. Authed only.

name: tp
description: Teleports a player to another player or x,y,z coordinate. /tp [target player] <destination player> OR /tp [target player] <x> <y> <z>. Authed Only.

name: tps
description: Broadcasts the current TPS to the channel. /tps [ 'all' | dimID ].

name: tpx
description: An improved version of the /tp command that works in between dimensions. tpx [player] {(<player> | <dimension>) | <x> <y> <z> [dimension]}. Authed only.

name: voice
description: Adds/removes voice on a player or reload the voice list.  /voice <add|remove|reload> <player>. Authed only.

name: weather
description: Change server weather. /weather <clear|rain|thunder> [duration in seconds]. Authed only.

name: whereis
description: Show where the given player is at on the server. /whereis <player>. Authed only.

name: whitelist
description: Modify server whitelist. /whitelist <on|off|list|add|remove|reload>. Authed only.
